data.text:
Hmm… so the log house… is over there? 
That means there's just a bit to go…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm… so the log house… is over there? 
󠁿That means there's just a bit to go…

data.text:
But… it really is a huge star… 
But, thanks to this sled I don't have to worry about that. 
And the snowfall has lightened too…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿But… it really is a huge star… 
󠁿But, thanks to this sled I don't have to worry about that. 
󠁿And the snowfall has lightened too…

data.text:
I'm going to answer your prayers soon everyone… 
Just wait a bit longer…!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿I'm going to answer your prayers soon everyone… 
󠁿Just wait a bit longer…!

data.text:
Ah! I see something over there, 
is that Oguri!? Oguri ☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿Ah! I see something over there, 
󠁿is that Oguri!? Oguri ☆

data.text: She's going to make it back safely…!
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: 󠁿She's going to make it back safely…!

data.text:
You can do it, Oguri-san ♪ 
Hey everyone, why don't we go and cheer her on?
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
󠁿You can do it, Oguri-san ♪ 
󠁿Hey everyone, why don't we go and cheer her on?

data.text: Huff… fuh…!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: 󠁿Huff… fuh…!

data.text: Oguri! You can do it!
data.name: Fan's Children
data.processed:
󠁿 
󠁿Oguri! You can do it!

data.text:
I can hear them…! 
Everyone, just a bit further and…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿I can hear them…! 
󠁿Everyone, just a bit further and…

data.text: (Thud… !)
data.processed: 󠁿(Thud… !)

data.text: …!? My foot…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: 󠁿…!? My foot…

data.text:
This is bad! Oguri-san, that's a cliff! 
Get back, you'll fall!
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
󠁿This is bad! Oguri-san, that's a cliff! 
󠁿Get back, you'll fall!

data.text: （Fall…）
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: 󠁿（Fall…）

data.text:
Oguri Cap was unable to gain a lead. She went for a drastic 
strategy… but it must have been too much for her.
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Oguri Cap was unable to gain a lead. She went for a drastic 
󠁿strategy… but it must have been too much for her.

data.text:
Ah… Oguri really couldn't do it, could she? 
That being said, she seemed as though she was 
giving it her all! No, she definitely was!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
󠁿Ah… Oguri really couldn't do it, could she? 
󠁿That being said, she seemed as though she was 
󠁿giving it her all! No, she definitely was!

data.text:
（No… I don't want to fall any lower. Instead, I'll make up for 
all my failures by flying forward!)
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿（No… I don't want to fall any lower. Instead, I'll make up for 
󠁿all my failures by flying forward!)

data.text:
Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle 
leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual 
ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
󠁿Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle 
󠁿leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual 
󠁿ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.

data.text:
That's right… all I need to do is take off! 
Haaaaaaa!!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿That's right… all I need to do is take off! 
󠁿Haaaaaaa!!

data.text: Wha… she's flying!?
data.name: Hayahide & Taishin
data.processed: 󠁿Wha… she's flying!?

data.text:
I can do it…! 
I can bring it to them…!!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿I can do it…! 
󠁿I can bring it to them…!!

data.text:
Woah, it's Santa-san! 
Oguri became Santa-san!!
data.name: Fan's Children
data.processed:
󠁿Woah, it's Santa-san! 
󠁿Oguri became Santa-san!!

data.text:
Woah… ☆ Oguri-san really became Santa-san…! 
Hey, Marve-chin, is that…!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
󠁿Woah… ☆ Oguri-san really became Santa-san…! 
󠁿Hey, Marve-chin, is that…!

data.text:
Yup…! It's so dazzling, so heart-racing, so marvelous! 
We've finally found the miracle we were looking for ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿Yup…! It's so dazzling, so heart-racing, so marvelous! 
󠁿We've finally found the miracle we were looking for ☆ ★

data.text: Alright… I've finally done it!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: 󠁿Alright… I've finally done it!

data.text: Woah! The tree outside finally has a star…! It's so beautiful!
data.name: Fans
data.processed: 󠁿Woah! The tree outside finally has a star…! It's so beautiful!

data.text:
It really is an amazing star. It's perfect for a Christmas spent 
with all of you… Thank you so much.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿It really is an amazing star. It's perfect for a Christmas spent 
󠁿with all of you… Thank you so much.

data.text:
Thank you too, Oguri! You looked so cool 
out there! You really became Santa-san!
data.name: Fan's Child
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you too, Oguri! You looked so cool 
󠁿out there! You really became Santa-san!

data.text:
R-Really? I was so focused that 
I don't really remember what happened…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿R-Really? I was so focused that 
󠁿I don't really remember what happened…

data.text:
You… were just like Santa, guiding his sled through the night 
sky. You ended up giving us another gift.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
󠁿You… were just like Santa, guiding his sled through the night 
󠁿sky. You ended up giving us another gift.

data.text:
A present…? 
But I didn't bring you any…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿A present…? 
󠁿But I didn't bring you any…

data.text:
Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. Seeing you fly 
through the sky reminded me of how moved I was when I first 
witnessed one of your races.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
󠁿Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. Seeing you fly 
󠁿through the sky reminded me of how moved I was when I first 
󠁿witnessed one of your races.

data.text:
Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. In your next 
race… You'll definitely show me something even more magnificent 
than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
󠁿Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. In your next 
󠁿race… You'll definitely show me something even more magnificent 
󠁿than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.

data.text: Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: 󠁿Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!

data.text:
…! Thanks… But you're the 
ones who have given me a gift.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿…! Thanks… But you're the 
󠁿ones who have given me a gift.

data.text:
You all gathered here today for my sake… and I'm very grateful 
for that. Your support, your expectations, they're what help me 
continue running. So…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿You all gathered here today for my sake… and I'm very grateful 
󠁿for that. Your support, your expectations, they're what help me 
󠁿continue running. So…

data.text:
I promise I will show you all something amazing 
in the next race. So I'm counting on you all to 
continue believing in me… Merry Christmas!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿I promise I will show you all something amazing 
󠁿in the next race. So I'm counting on you all to 
󠁿continue believing in me… Merry Christmas!

data.text: Merry Christmas!
data.name: Fans
data.processed: 󠁿Merry Christmas!

data.text:
I'll be sure to have a talk with Oguri-san later regarding her 
recklessness… I guess that concludes that, doesn't it?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
󠁿I'll be sure to have a talk with Oguri-san later regarding her 
󠁿recklessness… I guess that concludes that, doesn't it?

data.text: Sure does. And now you're free from being Santa.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: 󠁿Sure does. And now you're free from being Santa.

data.text: We don't need to be here anymore, so let's head back.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: 󠁿We don't need to be here anymore, so let's head back.

data.text:
Taishin, wait. You helped me create this miracle. 
I expect you have something to say.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
󠁿Taishin, wait. You helped me create this miracle. 
󠁿I expect you have something to say.

data.text: Don't get cocky now… dummy.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed: 󠁿Don't get cocky now… dummy.

data.text:
Jeez… you're the one not being honest now. Well anyways, it 
looks like our time to shine has ended, so let's…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
󠁿Jeez… you're the one not being honest now. Well anyways, it 
󠁿looks like our time to shine has ended, so let's…

data.text:
Wait up! This miracle isn't over yet! 
Everyone, come outside ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
󠁿Wait up! This miracle isn't over yet! 
󠁿Everyone, come outside ♪

data.text:
Woah… It's so beautiful… 
It was so white before…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
󠁿Woah… It's so beautiful… 
󠁿It was so white before…

data.text:
A sky filled with stars came in ☆ 
Oguri's run managed to kick away the snow clouds ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
󠁿A sky filled with stars came in ☆ 
󠁿Oguri's run managed to kick away the snow clouds ★

data.text:
No… It wasn't just my running. 
It was thanks to everyone's wishes that this happened.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿No… It wasn't just my running. 
󠁿It was thanks to everyone's wishes that this happened.

data.text:
Hayahide, Taishin, Mayano, Marvelous. I have to thank you all as 
well… So let's enjoy this party together!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
󠁿Hayahide, Taishin, Mayano, Marvelous. I have to thank you all as 
󠁿well… So let's enjoy this party together!
